Included Attachments:

I have all the setting on the high preset with 8x anti-aliasing and anisotropic filtering turned on. My resolution is set to 1920*1080 fullscreen. The UI scale is set to 100 but the navball is blurry regardless of that setting.
This issue is on our radar and we're investigating. Thanks for the reports!

Just started a game to see if I also have the blurry Navball issue and I do not.

My specs..

Cpu-I7 3770 @4.2

GPU-3070

32 gigs ram

Running game at 1920x1080

all graphics max

full screen and borderless

I did play yesterday for quite some time doing an Minmus mission and I am quite sure I did not see this bug.

Today when I opened the game the issue was clearly visible to me.

So either this is a sporadic bug, or I completely missed it yesterday.
I am following up on this one today - my best theory is that we accidentally failed to exempt this texture from some MIP compression script. Will update when confirmed.
This bug was resolved in hotfix v0.1.3.2.
